question.body: Which type of bone formation is most common in humans?

response.feedback: Incorrect. This type of bone formation is only found in a few bones, such as the skull.
Incorrect. Most of the bones in the body form and are repaired using endochondral ossification.
Correct. Most of the bones of the body form, and are repaired, using endochondral ossification.
Incorrect. These are the only two methods of bone formation.

part.hint: Most of the bones (by volume) in our body are long bones or other structural bones.
